column1: * 1959 – Game designer Anders Blixt is born.
* 1969 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Amy Ronald (20 March 1969).
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee continue their journey along the road to Barad-dûr.
** Faramir meets Éowyn in the Houses of Healing.Category:Dates
